meanings: (생각·감정 등이) disappear, go (away), (갑자기) vanish, (서서히) fade away
이성교제 Please get out of my sight.

vlive.korean: 제발 내 옆에서 사라져!!! Get away from me!!! 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 붐보의 서재 - EP. 06 엑소 정규 6집 언박싱! (덕질 과몰입해서 이중자아 돼버린 붐보&보붐⁉️)
[그리고 사라져버린 쯔위] 쯔위 어딨지? [Then, TZUYU disappeared] Where is she? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV "Feel Special" EP.09
[완전 극혐] 컵라면 지겨워! 컵라면 사라져! [Absolutely hate it] I'm tired of cup noodles! 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 로디 어나운스‼️ 나도 해봤다 (셀프) 2020 ver. Q&A 👀✌️ (내가 귀엽다고 생각하는 사람 다 드루와🙃)
vlive.english: [Absolutely hate it] I'm tired of cup noodles!

vlive.korean: 발자국이 없어지네요 - 뭐야, 뭐야 사라져? I see the footprints disappearing. - What? Disappear? 듣기 View video NCT : NCT U Coming Home 발매💚
vlive.english: I see the footprints disappearing. - What? Disappear?

vlive.korean: 가사가 사실 제가 멤버들한테 - 내게서 사라져! - 하고 싶은 말이... The lyrics express what I want to say to the members...- You disappear away from me. - I want to say... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [EXO] 엑망진창에 달팽이관 후끈후끈,, 트루 따뜻 윈터 with 엑소,, (EXO unboxing their new album 'OBSESSION’)
vlive.english: The lyrics express what I want to say to the members...- You disappear away from me. - I want to say...

examples.korean: ‘Get out of my sight!’ he boomed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “내 눈 앞에서 사라져!” 그가 우렁우렁한 목소리로 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Get out of my sight!’ he boomed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was gone in a trice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 순식간에 사라져 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The trail had gone cold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자취가 이미 사라져 버린 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He vanished without trace. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 흔적도 없이 사라져 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
